input: Ana m ele anya ya.
target: I look forward to it.

input: Mbe enweghị ezé.
target: Turtles don't have teeth.

input: Gwagodi Tomu ka-obata n'ime
target: Can you ask Tom to come inside

input: I nwere Ike Igwa Tomu ka-obata n'ime
target: Can you ask Tom to come inside

input: I na-akwado Iga ebe ahu
target: Are you planning to go there

input: Tomu na Mari akpara Ihe ahu
target: Did Tom discuss that with Mary

input: Enwere m ike ibiri gi diksonari a
target: Can I borrow this dictionary

input: Ihuru mgbe Tomu bara n'me ugbo ala ahu
target: Did you see Tom get on the bus

input: Enwerem ike iju gi ajuju ozo
target: Could I ask another question

input: Mu na ndi be Tomu ahubeghi.
target: I haven't met Tom's family yet.

input: Akam ahubeghi ndi be Tomu.
target: I haven't met Tom's family yet.

input: Amam na Tomu na-aruru Meri Oru.
target: I know Tom is working for Mary.

input: Ikwukwara Ihe meru
target: Did you report what happened

input: Amam na Tomu choro igwa m okwu.
target: I know Tom wants to talk to me.

input: Amam na Tomu choro ka mu na ya kpa.
target: I know Tom wants to talk with me.

input: Amam na Tomu choro ka mu na ya kwo.
target: I know Tom wants to talk with me.

input: I tinyere ihe na-asa efere ka obido.
target: Did you start the dishwasher

input: Mu na Tomu enwere Ike ikwu maka ihea
target: May I talk about this with Tom

input: Obu n'imaburo maka ihea
target: Didn't you know that already

input: I wepuru ahihia ahu
target: Did you take out the rubbish
